default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Welcome to Fortuna! Oh, pardon me. That's how I used to start conversations. Old habits die hard. But many do seem to have an acting talent here... Shall we have a chat about that soon?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Don't just stare at me. Enjoy the show!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Come on, let's have a drink to celebrate the perfect ending of the grand finale!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: My dear, time for you to shine on stage!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: The curtain fell on the perfect show! Such a fascinating story!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Sigh, a rare stage accident...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Please enjoy the show!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: All dreams vanish at this moment...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hmm, you came right when I thought of you. Well done! You deserve the praise.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: If it's what you wish, a word from me can promote you from an understudy to the main cast... But you must repay me for my investment.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Drop the formality with me... You don't need your sanity here, my dear. Just enjoy yourself and make bold choices!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Let me teach you the way to survive in this theater... Give your love to all, but never all your love to one.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: The theater is indeed an intricate thing. The seats in the boxes are red velvet. The chairs in the hall are the cheapest material. But just like how a play treats the audience equally, when the tickets are sold out, even the city councilors will have to rush to sit on the floor.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Imagine how boring it'll be if we all follow the predetermined path! Everyone needs to let loose and go a little crazy at some point... No matter who you become and where you go in the future, that moment will be an irreplaceable memory.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: A kiss is a wonderful but fleeting thing. When it fades, reality hits and the madness dries up. Some people accept it, others spiral. I wonder, if it were you, what unexpected choices would you make?

default.title: Compliance
default.text: Every moment with you, the next step always seems unpredictable. You are my most cherished dancer, my most beautiful singer. I'd let the flames swallow the entire theater, and we'd be acting out the utmost frenzy until we turn to ashes.

default.title: Idle
default.text: I love watching those kids on stage, seeing them so eager to drop everything and choose a different life... Hmm, how I enjoy these moments.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: It's truly dazzling, but for me, it's just some old tricks...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Do you prefer me over those pretty, adorable young ones? Hehe... You're bold and untamed, and that's what I like about you.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Sigh, how come I still need to go to social occasions personally...

default.title: Dispatch Completion
default.text: What a spectacle! Here, I even brought you a little souvenir.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Oh my, flowers for me? Have you mistaken me for some big name on stage? But sure, I'll accept them.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: If this scene could be reenacted, what would be... your choice?

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Don't be naughty... Now is not the time for that...
